offers.offer_description: Enjoy unlimited play Monday through Friday open to 5 PM and weekends until noon, get 10% off food and non-alcoholic beverages plus you can bring five guests every visit.
offers.terms_conditions: Summer Fun Pass includes unlimited 2-hour game play sessions valid through 9/1/2025 on weekdays until 5:00 PM and weekends until 12:00 PM (local venue time). Summer Fun Pass is non-refundable and non-transferable. Game play is for up to six (6) people in one (1) bay. Valid for walk-in or join the waitlist requests. Not valid with reservations. Purchaser of Summer Fun Pass must be present at all times to use the pass. Anyone under 16 must be supervised by a Guest 21+ at all times. Valid at participating Topgolf US Venues only. Not valid at Topgolf Auburn Hills, Boise, Brooklyn Center, Canton, Des Moines, Mobile, Myrtle Beach, Panama City Beach, Ridgeland, Salt Lake City, Vineyard, Lounge, Swing Suite or Toptracer Range locations. Excludes arcade games. All passes will automatically convert to a complimentary Lifetime Membership after 9/2/2025 and must adhere to the applicable Membership Agreement Terms & Conditions. Tax and gratuity not included.

offers.offer_description: Receive a $5 Lyft credit when you take and partially or fully pay for three (3) Eligible Rides in a calendar month using an eligible World or World Elite Mastercard credit card linked to your account.
offers.terms_conditions: Must participate in the Lyft and Mastercard's Take 3 Get $5 program. Rides must be paid for with an eligible World or World Elite Mastercard credit card (Apple Card not eligible, but Apple Pay or Google Pay may be eligible if World or World Elite Mastercard is the funding source). Limit one Credit per calendar month per Lyft account. An 'Eligible Ride' is any Lyft ride type, excluding business rides and bicycle and scooter rental rides. Valid only in the USA. Credits expire 30 days after application. Limited time only and while supplies last. By participating, you agree to these terms and Lyft's Terms of Service. Lyft and Mastercard may share information for tracking and processing the Credit. Credits may take up to 2 days to be applied. Program begins 4/1/21.
